channel.title: Comments on: SSIS A difference between C# and VB in a script task
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: ola
item.dc:creator: ola
item.description: Please can anyone point me to a good blog for beginners in C# for SSIS scripting
item.content:encoded: Please can anyone point me to a good blog for beginners in C# for SSIS scripting

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.dc:creator: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.description: You should not downgrade to C# anyway.
item.content:encoded: You should not downgrade to C# anyway.

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.dc:creator: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.description: Not the only difference. One that aanoys me most is the difference in capitals you sometimes get. And since C# is sensitive about it's capitals it can really screw up things.
item.content:encoded: Not the only difference. One that aanoys me most is the difference in capitals you sometimes get. And since C# is sensitive about it’s capitals it can really screw up things.

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: Good one Denis. That has got me staring at code for awhile before. Then it's the head on desk moment
item.content:encoded: Good one Denis. That has got me staring at code for awhile before. Then it’s the head on desk moment
